text: CrispbreadCRISPBREAD is a flat and dry type of bread or cracker made mostly of rye flour. Crispbreads are very light. They stay fresh for a very long time because they are so dry. Crispbread is a staple food. Medeltida trädgårdsväxter: Att spåra det förflutna It used to be called a poor man's diet. == Gallery == Different types and shapes of commercial crispbread: File:IKEA knäckebröd.JPG File:Knäckebrot-1.jpg File:Zwei Scheiben Knaeckebrot.jpg File:Falu råg-rut.JPG File:Swedish crisp bread.jpg File:Näkkileipä.jpg File:Thin crispbread.jpg == Related pages == * Bublik * Dorset knob * Flatbread * Flatbrød * Hardtack * Lavash * Matzo * Ryvita, a brand of crispbread * Tunnbröd * Wasabröd, a Swedish company == Notes == == References == Category:Estonian food Category:Swedish food Category:Finnish food Category:Norwegian food Category:Breads
